headline: Is Verizon (VZ) Offering Value After Mixed Returns And Strong Cash Flow Forecasts?
summary: Wondering if Verizon Communications at around US$40.30 per share offers solid value or if you should be cautious right now? This article walks through the key numbers so you can judge that for yourself. Over the past week the stock recorded a 1% decline, while the 1 year return sits at 10.7% and the 3 year return at 15.7%. Taken together, these figures give you a mixed picture of recent shareholder outcomes. Recent coverage around Verizon has focused on its position in the US telecom market...
